website_summaries.verdict: High-priced, new model razor that adapts to your face to provide a smooth, comfortable shave.
pros: The Series 9 features titanium blades for a reliably close shave that follows the contours of your face
Works well for thick or curly hair, wet or dry
A fast and quiet shaver with 50 minutes of battery life
cons: Among the most expensive electric razors available

customer_reviews.title: 7 series remains superior
customer_reviews.text: I have heavily edited this review and downgraded from 4 to 2 after living with it for a few weeks. I've had it tug a few times, even with boots electric pre-shave and it always misses hairs from 3 days stubble and onward. (have to go back over with the 7 series) No way is it worth £449 so I'm glad I didn't pay that much. If you shave with it everyday then it's easier to live with, even on 2 day stubble it catches and pulls (usually twice per shave) I struggle to justify the £224 that I payed compared to £124 for the 7 series.
customer_reviews.author: Dazzaaa

customer_reviews.title: Although this is the best electric shaver I have used it is not the ...
customer_reviews.text: Although this is the best electric shaver I have used it is not the miracle machine suggested by some of the reviews on here. A lot of the reviews have been written by people that have received the product for free in exchange for a review. I purchased mine and I am pleased with it but no way would I have paid high street prices for it. In summary, if like me you use an electric shaver all the time then this is possibly one of the best out there but don't be fooled into thinking this is as good as a wet shave.
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Poor Shave for a premium price
customer_reviews.text: I brought this shaver on a discount deal. Even with this discount applied, this shaver is astonishingly overpriced. The quality of the shave just isn't good enough. I imagined a shave finish on par with a razor cut, but it's no where near it. It leaves me patchy with long hairs on my neck. I also have to go over the same area several times to remove the hair missed originally. This causes irritation under my neck. I wouldn't recommend this shaver. Save your money and get a cheaper one. It just isn't worth the inflated price tag.
customer_reviews.author: The Pretender

customer_reviews.title: Shave not close enough
customer_reviews.text: I usually wet shave . This razor does not give a close shave.
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: Degradation of quality
customer_reviews.text: I had the last version from 7 years ago, the materials now have been replaced by cheap plastic with a high sense of fragility. The cutting performance didn't increased so much. I will say that don't buy this because the extra price doesn't deliver extra premium quality or extra cutting quality. The series 7 it's the same and much much cheaper. I was not really expecting this.
customer_reviews.author: Gonçalo Vilhena

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic shaver with some minor quibbles on accessories Braun should include.
customer_reviews.text: Great shaver. Have had Braun electric shavers before and having had it for two months this shaver is still a pleasure to use. The shave is clean and so much quicker than my previous one. Battery life is surprisingly good. Being wet and dry means I’ve been able to travel with it and clean it along the way. I’m scoring it only 4 as given how much it costs Braun should have included three additional essential items - a small cleaning brush, some shaver oil to lubricate it after cleaning with water or using in shower, and most importantly of all a foil protector cap.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price at all
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this shaver. I was hoping it would be very efficient and fast, but it was neither unfortunately. It takes me as much time as with a regular razor if not more, but even worse it doesn’t shave effectively. And it’s pretty loud as well. Returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shaver when on offer !
customer_reviews.text: My expectations were very high ! Initially I was a little disappointed , but perseverance paid off . It's not a wet shave , but it comes damn close ! Once you get used to its little foibles , and how best to use it on your face it's a great shaver . Dont pay full price though , it's often on offer somewhere ! Cleaning station is great , cartridges expensive , but again shop around . It is the best electric shaver I have used . I dont think it is worth the full price though . For £200 or so it's more of a bargain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: which is otherwise excellent, was supplied with EU 2-pin plug and NOT ...
customer_reviews.text: Razor, which is otherwise excellent, was supplied with EU 2-pin plug and NOT UK 2-pin as advertised. A very common error these days with imports from China (I work in that business and see it so often). Amazon really should be checking properly. UK pins are slightly thicker, and shorter but the difference is obvious when you see them together (see picture). Customer service were superb and gave me a discount which alllowed me to purchase the correct UK plug from Braun without having to send the whole thing back.
customer_reviews.author: Mick L

customer_reviews.title: Constantly has faults
customer_reviews.text: Its hard to be more dissapointed in this razor. I have now had 4 in the past 2 years and they have all died. This latest one was just 5 days in and the cleaning light came on, so I ran the cleaning process and the next day the light comes on again. Now it turns itself on randomly thoughout the day! The previous 3 all just stopped working and the third of these is past the 2 year window - so thats in the bin. The shave itself is not bad and it feels good, its just the annoying sensors that turn it off (Braun say its to protect the motor).
customer_reviews.author: Tony Price

customer_reviews.title: Expensively disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time on my 2-week beard (similar to the one shown in the advert). It had no effect apart from making my skin very sore. I resorted to my wet razor to complete the job. This is a waste of money and Braun should be prosecuted for their misleading advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Bob H

customer_reviews.title: My shaving problems solved.
customer_reviews.text: My prayers are answered. I have suffered from a strong beard but very sensitive skin since the age of fifteen. I can shave with a blade, as I react badly to the metal. My previous Braun got work out and I risked trying this expensive shaver, expecting to return it with the 100 day guarantee, as I didn't believe it could be that good. It is that good. It's worth every penny. I wish I'd got one years ago! It's wonderful! Clean shaven, no rash, superb cleaning system, everything I could ever want in shaving terms.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Best-Quality Shaver From Braun
customer_reviews.text: This Braun Series 9 is very well made. Very nice to hold - ergonomic and comfortable. The shaver is smooth and gentle on the skin and gives the closest shave I have ever had from an electric shaver. I actually think it's as close as when I wet-shave? Lots of useful little features, such as battery indicator, head/foil life indicator, cleaning requirement indicator. You can lock the head in various positions or have it swivel. I've never used a swivel shaver before (always bought rigid ones) but this does seem to help with the shaving. Looks and feels very good quality. Very expensive, but it does seem to offer a very good shave.
customer_reviews.author: Trojanhorse11

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money stick with a wet shave manual razor
customer_reviews.author: Gag1985

customer_reviews.title: Good shave but.............
customer_reviews.text: I've had four of these now over about six years so I do like them but took off a star because the photo in the advertising on Amazon of the guy shaving with a clear line of shaved skin with a single swipe is just not possible. I only wish it was but its just not and I would challenge Braun to say how they got that effect - I suspect it took several swipes to achieve that photo effect. Other than that I'm quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: David James

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver, according to my Dad
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Dad for Xmas (he is an awesome dad!) He loves it. He's had the same Braun shaver for about 20 years and his old one was finally giving up. Time for a new one. Luckily he is not disappointed. He has been raving about it. He said the charge lasted well over a week, its easy to use. Does a great shave, and in his own words, his beard is tough! He could not speak more highly of it. I think my husband will be heading this way too when his gives up.
customer_reviews.author: lollypop

customer_reviews.title: Razor won’t charge from new
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. Mine did not charge when it was received from Amazon. I contacted Braun (as suggested by Amazon) who said it was manufactured in 2018. It had therefore been on a shelf for two years and the batteries would have deteriorated. I called Amazon who refunded my money but could not guarantee that if I ordered again that razor would charge
customer_reviews.author: Marmaduke

customer_reviews.title: Inappropriate for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Seriously? Paid £254 to get worst shaving experience? I thought it would be the best option not to get anymore razor bumps and get smooth shave without irritation but it made my neck to bleed.
customer_reviews.author: MD ROBIUL PARVEJ

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from my series 3 just to treat myself and I really wish I hadn’t. This razor is much broader and that is part of the problem. It is awkward for shaving under the nose and also around the area beneath and around the mouth. I have been nicked several times with this razor and been left with painful sores. The razor is quiet and smooth but it never delivers a close shave. I always have to follow up with a blade to get a satisfactory shave and that is poor to say the least. This is a purchase that was, for me, a bad and expensive mistake.
customer_reviews.author: rjj

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning station broke just outside guarantee period but Braun didn’t want to know although their long letters assured me of the quality of their products and how much they valued customers. I’ve found out the details myself and ordered the correct replacement cleaning station which cost £56 and unbelievably comes without a cable. It costs £19.99 separately: for a cable that doesn’t even have a uk plug! Do VWs come without tyres? Or German beer without froth? Or bradtwurst without skin? Or German customer service without empathy?
customer_reviews.author: Philip Iszatt

customer_reviews.title: Cruel on sensitive skin variable shave
customer_reviews.text: Shaves close as a blade? Well this razor certainly tries: for the first two weeks my skin felt like it was being vacuum sucked over a knife. As the blade lost its keenest edge the razor burn reduced, it’s not exactly pleasant now but quite manageable. I have soft pliable skin and the Braun doesn’t do well in many areas. Above the upper lip and around my chin it shaves close, if not closer than a blade; hooray! But elsewhere it’s disappointing I have to hold my skin very tight, making sure all hairs are bolt upright. I guess I just have the wrong kind of skin
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. Sterne

customer_reviews.title: Upgrading is not always better.
customer_reviews.text: Not a recommended purchase. I brought this for my husband as a Christmas present in 2017 and today he is finally putting it in the bin. After about 18 months it started making a horrible shrill sound wakes the whole household. (You can’t sleep through it) and pops the blades after about 4 months use, never gets near 12 months let a lone 18., at £50 a time its not good. Then there is the expense of the cleaning fluid. The whole thing is just so expensive to run and does not appear to improve the shave. Today buying a series 7 again, solid shaver without the running cost.
customer_reviews.author: Tokyo Lady

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Well I've had this for about 7 months now. I charged it for a few hours when I got it, although I didn't really need to, it was fully charged when I got it. Since then I have charged it only once and still going strong. I use it 2 to 3 times a week. I must say it does the job, manages to get rid of everything fairly well, although not as close shave as a blade. Anyway I find it better than a blade because no razor burn at all. This is the first shaver I've been able to use that doesn't cause big irritation and red blotches everywhere so very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shaver
customer_reviews.text: I have used Braun Shavers for years and this Series 9 is the best yet. It gives a great shave every time, close and smooth and comfortable which is the most important. The pivoting head works really well and the long hair trimmer is an essential. I don't know why all shavers don't have this. The shave is fast too and I get a good number of shaves per charge. I don't use the auto cleaning because although that works well I find the cleaner base station itself gets clogged up after a while is is terrible to clean out. Besides you can easily rinse the shaver head under the tap when you need to.
customer_reviews.author: Phase9

customer_reviews.title: Overated
customer_reviews.text: Well I thought I was getting the best shaver money could buy with the series 9.Coming from using a series 3 I expected a big difference in closeness of shave. What a disappointment I had to shave the same area at least 3 times and in end had to use a wet shaver. I've sent back for a refund because in my a opinion a shaver a quarter of the price will do a better job.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Pulls your face hair out
customer_reviews.text: I really should send this back but I can’t be bothered so I only have myself to blame, it works well if you shave daily, leave it for 2-3 days and it will tear your face off! I’ve almost thrown this in the bin a couple of times now. I really must shave daily to stop any pain.
customer_reviews.author: D C.

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver but very expensive
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used an electric shaver for 20+ years but wow the technology has improved. I am so impressed with this shaver. It is easy to use, quick and shaves extremely close. It is so close to a wet shave as to be virtually indistinguishable (I used to use Gillette Fusion 5 blade system). You won’t be disappointed- but don’t pay full price - hold out for the discounted price: 50% off makes it almost value for money. Thoroughly recommended but only if you can afford it.
customer_reviews.author: NealB

customer_reviews.title: The best Shaver ever used
customer_reviews.text: After being an devoted user of Philips shavers for over 40 years, I was disappointed with the 9000 I purchased a couple of years ago. The Braun Series 9 appeared on the Amazon "Daily Deals" for a reasonable price, so I purchased one. I am certainly glad that I did, this razor is giving me the closest shave I have ever had from an electric razor (nearly as good as a wet shave) and in virtually half the time of the Philips. I would highly recommend the Braun Series 9 to anyone who is looking for a stylish and efficient electric razor.
customer_reviews.author: Budgie

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it's just me - but
customer_reviews.text: This is certainly a good looking razor, however it does not perform any better than my previous razor which was less than half the discounted price. I have to qualify this statement:- I don't ever grow a beard or a moustache, I have soft hair and soft skin and it is maybe these characteristics that after shaving, I can still feel stubble. I will use the razor for day to day shaving, but will continue to have a wet shave with a safety razor to get the perfect shave.
customer_reviews.author: jambojack

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself.
customer_reviews.text: Best shave yet. Read a lot of comments about Phillips shavers, they don't come anywhere near in my opinion...
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. GREAVES

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and close shave
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this shaver is fantastic. It cuts with very little effort. The shave is smooth. The razor is comfortable to hold. The cleaner station is brilliant at cleaning and charging. It gives out a clean lemon fragrance plus the added bonus is it dries after a clean. Braun have done it again. Although in the short term expensive. But over a longer period of time you save on razors. Plus you pay big bucks because you want a reliable shaver that does the job. It's great for those with sensitive skin. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good........
customer_reviews.text: My 3 series bit the dust after 5 years...... I read all the reviews of newer shavers and plumbed fo the 9 series... ouch, what price !!! However, I took the plunge with some Amazon vouchers from Xmas and must say, it is a bit better, quieter, better cleaning station, nicer to hold and eventually shaves you nice and smooth, but it does take time, and I have not got a sturdy bristle. If you can get an easy shave with an earlier version and cheaper, go for it. This series 9, is expensive but I suppose it will be better in reflection.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sigsworth

customer_reviews.title: Like a nicely wrapped Christmas Present that your disappointed with the contents of!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a replacement & gift for Husband who is a Braun using man - he loves his Braun, won't use anything else and hasn't for 40 years. His trusted but now old shaver had finally thrown in then "towel" so to speak so I treated him to a new one. Wish I hadn't bothered TBH. Looked lovely, but Hubby being a retired Engineer wasn't impressed with the build quality! And returned it without even trying it out. Says it all really...
customer_reviews.author: Lisa parkinson

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt recommend
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt power on just after 2 months of use. Turns itself On all by itself and turns off all of a sudden. Sometimes middle of the night - absolute non sense. Have to Hold power button ON for long time to keep it running.Shaving Blades are causing irritation to skin. Waste of money, wouldnt recommend. I used to have previous version of Braun which was much better..
customer_reviews.author: Rakesh

customer_reviews.title: Best Braun Shaver i’ve had!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a previous 9 series Braun shaver which has always been good but after 5 years stopped working. I replaced this at a price on Amazon that beat all other offers and I am not disappointed with it. It’s the best shave I have had from an electric razor and the new multi head Shaving foil is really smooth so overall very pleased with my purchase. Battery life is better than the previous one lasting almost two weeks between charges 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - It's Always Clean and Correctly Lubricated
customer_reviews.text: I'm delighted with this shaver. It's light and comfortable to hold. There is almost no vibration and it gives a fast, perfect shave with no need to go over any missed hairs because there are none. But the most satisfying aspect is that I know it's always sterile and correctly lubricated because I use Clean and Charge Station after every shave. Overall, I can give this product my highest recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Toad

customer_reviews.title: Starting with 4 stars... good shaver (until now...)
customer_reviews.text: I had before a Series 9 Model 9090cc that last only 3 years, before dying from the head holder. So, I took back my 18 years old Braun shaver with a new head, and found that it is still able to shave 4 days on the same battery charge, and it was shaving as close as the Series 9. That's why I will set only 4 stars to this super expensive shaver. From from, the Series 9 is silent, but I know it will quickly become very noisy with time (as the 9090 did).
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Best electric shaver
customer_reviews.text: Best electric shaver if you use electric pre shave gel/oil. I used to wet shave every day for work. So decided to go down the electric shaver route. This was in the Black Friday deal. So it takes some time for your skin to get used an electric shave. However I’ve found that if I use pre shave oil/gel it’s as close to a wet shave as you can get! Battery life is amazing. I’ve cleaned it twice using the official way. Usually I just rinse it with hot water. After shave balm and jobs a good un!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I got a bad one
customer_reviews.text: Garbage! Maybe I got a bad one! Ended up going back to my manual!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic shaver worth every penny if your thinking of getting this shaver just buy it you wont be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: col

customer_reviews.title: A cut above Series 7
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Series 9 after my trusty Series 7 finally gave up following years of use. The difference is amazing. Lighter, quieter and better looking (not that that’s important), it gives a much smoother shave. With my Series 7 I’d have to top up the electric shave with a quick wet shave to get a super smooth face, but not with the Series 9. It’s an expensive piece of kit but well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Facial hair type coarse
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product overall but do your research when buying expensive electric shavers it failed to cut my thick coarse hair and irritated my skin because i had to spend a lot of time going over many areas ive bought another brand of foil which is the right one for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Best Clean shave I have had with an Electric Shaver
customer_reviews.text: I have been doing a wet shave for many many years. the last time I used an Electric shaver on a regular basis was back in the early 90's (not a cheap one), which eventually put me off using an electric shaver because of the bad rash I used to get and the ingrowing hairs that caused me problems with my skin. This shaver was recommended by a friend who has the 7 series shaver and he swore by it, so I gave it a go! What a fantastic shaver, a really close shave and in less time to shave. I would really recommend this shaver to anyone and challenge the wet shavers to try it.
customer_reviews.author: JOE

customer_reviews.title: Honestly...
customer_reviews.text: Despite having very good finishes, great accessories, and a very good finish in general, I still do not feel those great benefits that were promised. I tried it without foam and with it, and I almost think the result was worse with foam. It burned my face as it has always happened with electric razors. I thought that given its high cost, this was going to be the ultimate shaving tool, but now it has just become an ornament in my room ... and by the way, a very expensive one. It will take a few years for you to experience a blade-like experience like Fusion.
customer_reviews.author: Dprometeo

customer_reviews.title: The cleaning process is a wonderful innovation, however
customer_reviews.text: A very high quality shaver continuing the high standard of Braun. The cleaning process is a wonderful innovation, however, the warning light to clean the unit is a gimmick. The unit is switched on and off without use, and the next time you switch it on it shows the clean light - the battery does not require charging and to clean and charge continually at this point will rapidly destroy the battery life. In this modern day of technology, it would be so easy to include a circuitry that activated the clean light as the battery illuminated bar graph reaches two bars. This said, the shaver is excellent in operation and as previous Braun models, gives a clean close shave.
customer_reviews.author: J GOODALL

customer_reviews.title: love it, eventually!
customer_reviews.text: had this a fair few weeks and although I do return to my old razor as it has an interchangeable head specifically for trimming the beard and it does it better than the precision razor on this. Other than that its brilliant, smooth and a very close shave by perseverance and using it daily for 2-3 weeks. I was told I'd need to give it that long as with my old razor being a 3 head rotary razor, my hairs would need this time to grow in a correct way for this razor to work, so bare that in mind!
customer_reviews.author: Dinner 4-2

customer_reviews.title: The best shaver i have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The best shaver i have ever owned. After some research its clear this is an excellent product and upon purchasing i was not disappointed. Offers ability to have quick care free shaves. Electric shavers will never offer the try closeness of a full razor shave but hey, it takes about a quarter of the time
customer_reviews.author: phildeba

customer_reviews.title: Expensive razor.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband but we don’t think it is a good shaver. It doesnt seem to get right to the skin and get a close shave. In some places like under the jaw and down the neck it doesn’t shave at all. Very expensive for a not very good razor. You’d do better with a £1 bic wet shave razor. We ran out of time to return it, mores the pity.
customer_reviews.author: Mollymandy

customer_reviews.title: Never use plugged into mains.
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this product, gives a very close shave wet or dry, but not has close has a five blade fusion wet shave razor, not to happy using the popup trimmer has where it is position you can't actually see where you are trimming because the head of shaver hides where you want to trim, all in all it still does a good job and should last me a life time. Easy to maintain and clean manually or automatically if you purchased the cleaning/charging unit. If in UK you will need a three pin adaptor has it only comes with a 2 pin charging lead.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: It obviously has been designed for people with hair that grows straight and not in a curly.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to hold, the battery hold it’s charge excellently. Unfortunately for my hair type it struggles to do a complete hair removal task and so I use it between using a razor blade which defeat my reason for choosing an expensive electric shaver. The side trimmer is far from satisfactory as it can’t cut a low as the shaving foil. It does have a good feel and finish about it.
customer_reviews.author: B WAB

customer_reviews.title: NOT a UK shaver (BS-4573) plug, poor shave for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This product does not come with a UK shaver charging plug (ie BS-4573), it's an EU charging plug. To be fair to Braun they did send me a UK shaver plug charger free of charge when I complained to them about this (note: a whole new charger, not just a 99p 13A mains adaptor for the charger in the box) but confirmed that all their shavers sold in the UK now come with an EU plug. The actual shave is average at best - I have an old Braun battery travel shaver that works just as well with my 46 year old face and can still be purchased for a lot less. My first disappointing Braun product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: So I own a series 7 and Panasonic Lv95 and although the shave performance is no better than the series 7 it is faster, I would recommend this shaver if you're like me and require to be ready for work in a very short time, shave and drop it in the cleaner unit and hit the button and your done. The shave performance isn't as close as the Panasonic but after 6 month's the Panasonic required a new blade and cassette, my series 7 lasted 2 years of this head lasts 2 years then it's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: j0rz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.....
customer_reviews.text: This is my first electric shaver. Having previously wet shaved for years I was genuinely amazed at how close this got, pretty much indistinguishable from a good wet shave. As when wet shaving, I used the Braun in the shower with a good quality shave gel, and with good beard prep. Certainly, it takes more passes of the Braun to get this close, especially with a longer growth (which I had), but nevertheless was a pleasant revelation to find it this capable. The head is very easy to remove and clean, even without the cleaning station which is very effective. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: At this price I was expecting something good - and it delivered - a very close shave. The gimmick of a cleaning station actually does give you a sparkling clean shaver everytime you use the wash - and provides a useful storage pod. The one downside would be the trimmer that is very ineffective and not as good as some comparable products
customer_reviews.author: DJT

customer_reviews.title: not so good at digging out hairs which lye flat to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace my series 7. Lovely to use. Cuts through 2-3 day stubble really effortlessly and is ever so quick. MUCH quieter than the series 7 which should come with some ear defenders in my opinion. But, not so good at digging out hairs which lye flat to the skin, so I'm getting more in-grown hairs. Therefore 4 stars - happy with it but it's not perfect. Oh and the display is a step down from the LCD on the series 7 in my opinion as well.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: No improvement over 7 Series
customer_reviews.text: I baught this thinking it would be an improvement on my previous machine, the 7 Series Braun shaver. Having used it for a few days, it quickly became apparent that it was not shaving closer than the previous shaver. Additionally it did not have the same features of the 7 Series, such as an adjustable shave setting. The clean and refresh feature took longer to clean the shaver than the previous generation machine. Overall no noticable improvements over the 7 Series, which considering it costs over £200 is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin, London

customer_reviews.title: Travel mode malfunction, razor useless.
customer_reviews.text: So this razor was great until it was just over 2 years old and started to malfunction. It gets stuck in travel mode, power button becomes unresponsive, it randomly starts at night time, when it does start it just switches off again after a few seconds and basically doesn't do what you want it do do ie turn on and stay on. Useless, it's in the bin, bought a Philips and will never buy a braun again as customer service was shocking. Check out you tube and loads of people have had the same problem. 300 quid wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: This is a lot of money....but worth it
customer_reviews.text: So this really is a lot of money. For a shaver. Do not hesitate to buy it. I never thought it possible for a shaver to get as close a shave as a razor. This does it. I reckon it must be witchcraft. Talking of witchcraft, I have the dock cleaning thing as well. I wasn’t sure if I should bother but it’s ace. I don’t keep it plugged in all the time. The only downsides to this shaver is that it buzzes more than others I’ve had. Yes I’m having to be that picky. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I have always bought Braun at more modest price level as was sceptical of the advantages of spending such a lot. I was in a good mood so went for it this time and amazed how much better this model is in comparison. I most notice reduced vibration and particularly how good it is if you miss a day and have a heavier beard - doesn't seem to make any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip N Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Be aware: comes with an EU 2 pin plug, not a UK 2 pin plug
customer_reviews.text: Just a heads up that you get an EU 2 pin plug with this, NOT the UK version (see photos). I've had problems charging this from a 2 pin adapter and my bathroom shaver socket because of this. I've ordered a replacement Braun UK 2 pin charger to resolve this. I wish I'd bought it from Shavers.com who sell it with the UK plug.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hallows

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but works great.
customer_reviews.text: Makes my old Phillips 5 series seem like it was made by idiots. This shaver just works. No more red neck when I keep going over a section to get stubborn hair. The charger/cleaner works great and even leaves the shaver smelling nice with no hairs or dirt. Well done Braun.
customer_reviews.author: Hypno

customer_reviews.title: The best just got better!
customer_reviews.text: When I bought my Series 7 I was stunned at how much better it was than my previous Philips. But when I got the 9, mainly because it was on offer and gave the opportunity to gift my 7 to my son, I wasnt expecting much of an improvement. I was wrong. It shaves faster and gets more awkward hairs first time. The trimmer is better. It rinses under a tap better as the head is more open, and finally the cleaning station has a little fan that dries it after cleaning nice and quickly. Simply excellent
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. Gascoyne

customer_reviews.title: Best shaver ever.
customer_reviews.text: My last Braun shaver lasted me over 25 years. I couldn't change the batteries or would still use that one ... it's still my emergency spare ! This one is even better, with a fantastic battery life and is even better at catching all the hairs of the beard, regardless of their orientation. Great product, from the best manufacturer in this field, in my opinion. Buy without fear or hesitation, they are simply the very best.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Smith

customer_reviews.title: By far the best I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I had never used this style before and when they say thing like "you've never had a closer shave" Im ready to call BS but WOW this was super good. It give the results and smoothness of using a blade razor. Easy to use but a little chunky in the hands. Really happy with this and will be using this style from now in.
customer_reviews.author: TOFFEE

customer_reviews.title: Super shaver.
customer_reviews.text: Have used a Plilishave for years and always been quite satisfied. Decided to give Braun a try and purchased the Series 9. I always thought the Philishave gave a close shave but since using the Braun, I realise what I've been missing. It's giving a really close, comfortable shave with little effort. It's very well made and beautifully finished. It comes with a good quality hard case, clean and charge station and charging lead. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: A top shaver that works well.
customer_reviews.text: Replaces my Braun 700 series. More slender, perhaps shaves a little closer. Nice feel. Battery seems about the same life. The beard trimmer attachment seems a little flimsy. Worrying, because that is what died (after many years) in my 730. Braun shaver owner for 30 years. Would not buy another make.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: The feel of an expensive gadget
customer_reviews.text: This is one beautiful piece of gadget for men! I have used Philips shavers for twenty years. Decided to have a change as the Philips shavers have become very ‘plasticky’ and cheap looking. This 9000 series really fits the bill. Beautifully made and works very well. Loving it!
customer_reviews.author: easternwarrior

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews but ignored some about ripping hairs out. I tried mine and wished I'd taken heed of the warnings. It was bloody painful, it tore a lot of the hairs out, so I had to return. Could have been the stubble on my face but who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap but worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Love this razor! Never seem to get the perfect shave and return eventually back to wet shaving but this one gives a great shave and you can just feel the quality. Looks great and cleans really well with machine so the razor always performs well. This was a great investment for me!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably Great Shaver
customer_reviews.text: I used the Braun 360 series for years - loved it, but over time (10 years or so) the battery could no longer hold its charge. I spent months looking for a replacement and eventually took the plunge with the 9296cc. The shaver is amazing - I wish I had purchased it much earlier. I don't really like shaving, but this new shaver helps me get the job done quickly and more effectively than ever before. I waited for the right price before buying it, but either way, the shaver is remarkable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Kevin N Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver, well worth considering
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Philishave shavers all my life & the various models I had been using for many years have been discontinued & no direct replacement so thought I would try a shaver from a different company especially after reading the reviews. I am very pleased with the results, far better than the old model. It took about 7 days to get used to it as it’s a different shaped head & it’s a bit larger. But more than happy with the results
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: Still getting used to it. Only problem so far is that it’s too easy to accidentally turn it off while in use because of the position of the switch. I’ve now got 5 rechargeable Braun shavers all still working but I fancied an upgrade. Charge seems to last well, haven’t had to charge it yet since initial charging.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Best razor so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Xmas gift for my partner who has very sensitive skin that would get patchy and red with his last shave. After research this razor looked like it would be a good choice and an improvement for his skin. He’s been very pleased with the quality and closeness of the shave and has had no reddening to his skin. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Creative Type

customer_reviews.title: Good shave
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple of shaves to get used to it and get the best shave but very happy with it however the trimmer is nowhere near as good as my old philips. The cutter feels too fine to do anything but that may just be me! The wash system is very good although the capsules will be an expense as they don't seem to last that long and the wash cycle is noisy. If I had to replace this in the future I think I would go back to a 3 head philips.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Charles

customer_reviews.title: A superb razor.
customer_reviews.text: My seven year old series 7 was getting a bit old in the tooth so I decided to upgrade to the series 9. The difference in shave was light and day - in my opinion, on a par with a wet shave. No way can this razor be called a cheap razor but, considering it’s excellent performance, it’s well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: J.T.

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes this shaver with cleaning station. It Gives a really close shave. He’s had it for months now and he is totally converted to shaving this way. He totally recommends it.👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Sammi

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't cut!
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling with this for a few months! It doesn't cut! I don't know if the head is faulty or what?! It seems to be a powerful machine but doesn't do jack! I have to even push it on my face/neck in the hope of it cutting the beard! Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nader Fard

customer_reviews.title: Usual High Quality From Braun
customer_reviews.text: I am a bit of a Braun fan, having had a number of their razors over the years. I am very happy with this model. It is undoubtedly the best that I have had. The build quality is excellent and the shave that I get is also the best that I have had. All the models that I have had previously lased me for years and I expect this one to do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, feels premium.....but
customer_reviews.text: So i used Philip's for 15 years, saw a black friday deal for this one and took the plunge thinking it was a great markdown/bigger is better/more expensive is better etc..... I'm pretty sure I dont need to shock you with where this sreview is going! Save your money it looks great...but inhale to shave after every shave!
customer_reviews.author: Philip Procter

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Bought for hubby who shaves his head every other day. We’ve just electric shavers, plastic razors and barber cuts. This is the is amazing. Recommended by our sons barber it’s worth every penny. The trimmer is easy to use. Very precise and clean cut. The cleaning system is a little noisy but it cleans really well. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Vikki Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Premium product
customer_reviews.text: Having been a safety razor guy for years, having very coarse daily stubble, I didn't expect this to quite cut it. I was wrong, the 9000 series gives me a brilliantly close shave, with no razor burn, no ingrown hairs or soreness. I use it dry, tap out and rinse the blades, then put in the cleaning station. In my view this premium product is worth the premium price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Truely amazing shaver
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I would go electric. 20+ years of manual wet shaving but all the reviews were so positive that I thought I'd give it a try. Now very glad I did! Persistent razor burn and rashes are a thing of the past. Great to use, not too heavy and cuts through 4-5 day stubble with a breeze (couple of passes required but takes minutes). One of the best purchases I've made in my lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: DanC

customer_reviews.title: First class razor
customer_reviews.text: I have always bought the best shavers available as I have a tough beard growth and need a quality shaver. My last two shavers have been Braun's, the latest being the top 7 series razor. This one however is the ultimate in shaving, it's much quieter then the 7 series and the shave is so much closer. There is absolutely no snagging of the skin or even the most stubborn of hairs. The cleaning system is a lot better than previous versions and with the fan drying feature, leaves the razor in a lovely clean and ready to use state. I am well impressed with this razor and wouldn't hesitate in recommending it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Gregson

customer_reviews.title: Razor still rules
customer_reviews.text: Being top of the line product from Braun I was a little disappointed with the shaving ability of this apparatus. Having used razor blades till now, I decided to try this product upon recommendation of some people however I can safely and easily say that a Gillette Fusion 5 blades razor blade cuts far better, far cleaner and faster than using this shaver. Additionally with the razor blade there is no need to shave against the grain which is essential when using the Braun shaver and even after this Braun cannot shave as clean as the razor I mentioned above. The construction and looks of this Braun cannot be faulted.
customer_reviews.author: Bozz

customer_reviews.title: This is the best!
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion the best shaver available. I have used Braun shavers for years and this one is the top of the range. Quiet in operation, gives an excellent shave in all areas, even after a few days growth it picks up short and longer hairs. Great overall design, neat responsive controls. Very good trimmer, on the back of the shaver activated by a simple push-up mechanism. Also comes with an automated cleaning system.
customer_reviews.author: Clive S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for a quick tidy up but not the close shave I was after.
customer_reviews.text: The shave isn't as close and as clean as I thought it would be. Have to keep going over the same area to get remaining hair, slightly annoying. Using an electric shaver doesn't help with the way you're facial hair grows, which leads to the odd razor bump and irritation. I use it now for just a quick tidy up. Was hoping this purchase would reduce my foot print on recycling but I feel that I still prefer my Gillette Fusion Razor.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Morton

customer_reviews.title: No more burn...smooth face. I’ll never switch back to razors.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never had an electric shaver until now, always used Gillette but have had some flare ups of spots due to allergies and razor was continually causing more issues. I went for this Braun on GQ recommendations and did wonder if it could get near the smoothness. OMG why did I not switch sooner in life! It’s so good on face area - a couple of good swipes and it’s very very smooth. Neck area trickier but I use the trimmer part here to get really close hairs. Honestly I couldn’t be happier, no shaving burn anymore and skin already feeling and looking so much better. I’ll never switch back. Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr C

customer_reviews.title: When released I decided to buy a new good razor and looked at all of them before buying ...
customer_reviews.text: I was in hospital and needed a cheap electric razor. My wife bought a real cheapo for €17. When released I decided to buy a new good razor and looked at all of them before buying a Braun Series 9. This comes all singing and dancing with every gizmo that you can imagine. Problem is that they forgot to check on the shaving bit and the cheapo shaves quicker and closer. The Braun is obviously beautifully made but they forgot the shaving bit.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Waring

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: It was a huge amount of money to pay for a shaver but I am very pleased with my purchase. It is better than both my older series 5 and series 7 shavers. I do wish Braun would standardise the charging cord as I know have three different ones that aren't interchangeable!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C. Read

customer_reviews.title: Close shave
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up as a replacement to a Braun series 7 when the priced was at its lowest. Definitely a nicer shave than the series 7 (not that the series 7 was bad). The self cleaning unit seems to be a little a little more basic compared to the series 7 (only has the one button clean rather than long/short cleaning of the series 7). Was pleased the cleaning units are exactly the same for both series 7 and 9 which meant I can use them in either cleaning unit.
customer_reviews.author: Zico

customer_reviews.title: Impressive close shave, with really reduced daily shave times.
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with closeness and speed at which I can now complete a full shave. This was an upgrade from my old series 3 and has made daily shave a breeze; no more excessively running over the same spot. Battery life is really good and takes very little time to charge. Great value product.
customer_reviews.author: keith cresham

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very very impressed, an electric razor will Never get as close as a wet shave , but I don’t believe any electric shaver could get closer than this one does. I use the cleaning station once per week, which cleans and freshens the shaver perfectly.....I will use a bottle of real liquid from a certain auction site, as the cartridges do work out expensive Spent age ages researching shavesrs and I was lucky to hot on one that is most likely the best on the market
customer_reviews.author: Reddwaf4ever enterprises

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shaver
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Braun Shaver for over 20 years, but have tried others in between to see how they worked. This one supersedes them all. The "Closest Shave", pardon the pun, I've had for years. Well worth the money and Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: FRED W

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my Phillips electric razor. Great price and battery life os good. However it does not shave as close as my 10 year old Phillips. Was a little disappointed. Mostly have to use a wet razor on my neck after shaving with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jase74656

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Purchased at a reasonable price when on a promotion so all in all I am satisfied with the razor. Works pretty well although not that much different in closeness of shave to my previous series 3 really. Battery life is fantastic. I find it easy to inadvertently switch it off whilst shaving which is annoying. Clean and recharge works well.
customer_reviews.author: Scraggy

customer_reviews.title: but you get a great deal of bang for your buck (so to speak)
customer_reviews.text: Having wet shaved for 30 plus years I decided to take the plunge and go electric. It is not cheap (even with £100.00 knocked off the price), but you get a great deal of bang for your buck (so to speak). The charging/cleaning station is great, the build quality overall is excellent and the shave you get is amazing. No more razor burn or tissue paper covering the cuts. It takes some getting used to and it is a bit loud, but for those of you who suffer from sensitive skin and razor burn (especially on the neck) it is worth (in my opinion) making the change.
customer_reviews.author: Jackdaw 101

customer_reviews.title: Braun have raised their game once again
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th or 5th Braun shaver - they get better with every new series. Obviously, this cuts even better than the previous 8 series of shavers. The addition of the 4th row of cutters with different properties, means that the problem of stray hairs on the neck has mostly gone away. But the icing on the cake is that it is a lot quieter than all the others! So now its possible to CONTINUE listening to the news or a podcast in the morning, even while you are shaving :-)
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Shaved really good
customer_reviews.text: Very good shaver, shaves good enough to face the business meetings I attend, probably the nearest to a wet shave I’ve used, the cleaning station is brilliant and the razor feels like new after finished. A good purchase for me 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Many years later with technology being far better I decided to look into another one
customer_reviews.text: I used an electric razor many years ago and I came up in a rash, I tried several times after that with the same result. Many years later with technology being far better I decided to look into another one. I read many reviews before settling on this shaver. The results are amazing, I have sensitive facial skin hence the problems I had in the past but this razor has caused any rash at all, not even a slightly. Yes it is expensive but for me it was well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Best shaver ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is a review of the braun series 9 (£190 version) bought from Amazon I've used braun series 7 prior and can honestly say the series 9 is far superior, shaves closer than the 7 in stubborn areas, and feels like I've just had a wet shave, it really is that close a shave. I used it for a dry shave as I'm used to that, and even though it's a very close shave, no skin irritation Wonderful well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: starz

product_meta.title: Braun Series 9 Electric Shaver for Men 9242s, Wet and Dry, Integrated Precision Trimmer, Rechargeable and Cordless Razor with Charging Stand and Travel Case, Black/Eloxal Blue

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
